revised_title: Corrected Phase Dispersion of Three-Layer Zinc Sulfide-Cryolite Coatings
tldr: The author recalculates the phase dispersion values for three-layer zinc sulfide-cryolite coatings, correcting previous assumptions and providing accurate measurements of wavelengths. The findings show that the points lie on a straight line within experimental errors, and the corrected values are graphically represented. This recalculation allows for precise wavelength determinations using multilayer dielectric coatings.
